pullRequest.title: DOCS-1660 Move how to build schema registry into README, out of docs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description:
https://confluentinc.atlassian.net/browse/DOCS-1660
See comment thread on the above DOCS Jira for more context. I'll pull this section out of the Docs after it gets added to the README when this PR is merged.


moved description of "how to build" Schema Registry out of the docs (here) into the README, similar to how it's done for KSQL (on master branch)


added a TOC to the README


Please review this version, which includes my changes: README.md
Signed-off-by: Victoria Bialas vicky@confluent.io

commit.message:
DOCS-1660 Move how to build schema registry into README, out of docs

Signed-off-by: Victoria Bialas <vicky@confluent.io>

added TOC to README

Signed-off-by: Victoria Bialas <vicky@confluent.io>

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -124,6 +140,41 @@ with Maven.
 This project uses the [Google Java code style](https://google.github.io/styleguide/javaguide.html)
 to keep code clean and consistent.
 
+To build:
+
+```bash
+mvn compile
+```
+
+To run the unit and integration tests:
+
+```bash
+mvn test
+```
+
+To run an instance of Schema Registry against a local Kafka cluster (using the default configuration included with Kafka):
+
+```bash
+mvn exec:java
+```
+
+To create a packaged version, optionally skipping the tests:
+
+```bash
+mvn package [-DskipTests]
+```
+
+This will produce a version ready for production in `package/target/kafka-schema-registry-package-$VERSION-package` containing a
